item.title: Shiny App Write Up
item.description: In a previous post, we imported oil data from Quandl and applied a simple model to it. Today, weâ€™ll port that work over to a Shiny app (by way of flexdashboard, of course) that allows a user to choose a commodity (oil, copper or gold), choose a frequency for the time series and choose how many periods ahead to forecast. The app will display the price history and the forecasted price.
